pages.text:
Events
Soccer Matches at Mary Margaret's
Sunday August 31st
Sunday may 8th
Sundays and Saturdays every week
Love the thrill of the English Premier League and the passion of Glasgow Celtic FC? Mary Margaret’s is the place to be! Whether you’re a dedicated supporter of clubs like Manchester United, Arsenal, Liverpool, or Chelsea, or simply a fan of the beautiful game, our big screens and enthusiastic crowd make every match unforgettable. English Premier League fans bring their energy and passion, turning Mary Margaret’s into the ultimate game-day destination.
Join St Pete Shamrock - Tampa Bay's CSC, proud supporters of Glasgow Celtic FC, as they cheer on their team with unmatched enthusiasm. Share the camaraderie of devoted fans, whether you’re celebrating goals, debating calls, or singing your team’s chants. Wear your team colors, join in the excitement, and feel the energy of every moment.
Follow us on
Facebook
and
Instagram
for updates, schedules, and all the latest buzz. Come experience soccer like never before at Mary Margaret’s—where the passion of the Premier League and Celtic pride come alive!
10:00 AM - 10:00 PM
2025-08-31 10:00:00
2025-08-31 22:00:00
America/New_York
Soccer Matches at Mary Margaret's
Love the thrill of the English Premier League and the passion of Glasgow Celtic FC? Mary Margaret’s is the place to be! Whether you’re a dedicated supporter of clubs like Manchester United, Arsenal, Liverpool, or Chelsea, or simply a fan of the beautiful game, our big screens and enthusiastic crowd make every match unforgettable. English Premier League fans bring their energy and passion, turning Mary Margaret’s into the ultimate game-day destination.Join St Pete Shamrock - Tampa Bay's CSC, proud supporters of Glasgow Celtic FC, as they cheer on their team with unmatched enthusiasm. Share the camaraderie of devoted fans, whether you’re celebrating goals, debating calls, or singing your team’s chants. Wear your team colors, join in the excitement, and feel the energy of every moment.Follow us on Facebook and Instagram for updates, schedules, and all the latest buzz. Come experience soccer like never before at Mary Margaret’s—where the passion of the Premier League and Celtic pride come alive!

Monday Night Karaoke
Monday September 1st
Sunday may 8th
Every Monday
Monday Night Karaoke – Powered by High Rise Beverages
Join us every Monday at 10p for Karaoke Night, sponsored by High Rise Beverages! Whether you're here to sing your heart out or cheer on your friends, it's the perfect way to kick off your week.
Great vibes, cold drinks, and your favorite songs all night long.  Plus, 40% off for all service industry pros – just show proof of employment.
See you Monday – the mic is waiting!
All Day Drink Specials
High Rise Beverages -
THC Infused Hightails
MANGO MARGARITA
High Rise Mango, Lime, Agave, Tajín
BLUEBERRY MOJITO
High Rise Blueberry, Mint, Lime, Sugar

Events
Soccer Matches at Mary Margaret's
Sunday August 31st
Sunday may 8th
Sundays and Saturdays every week
Love the thrill of the English Premier League and the passion of Glasgow Celtic FC? Mary Margaret’s is the place to be! Whether you’re a dedicated supporter of clubs like Manchester United, Arsenal, Liverpool, or Chelsea, or simply a fan of the beautiful game, our big screens and enthusiastic crowd make every match unforgettable. English Premier League fans bring their energy and passion, turning Mary Margaret’s into the ultimate game-day destination.
Join St Pete Shamrock - Tampa Bay's CSC, proud supporters of Glasgow Celtic FC, as they cheer on their team with unmatched enthusiasm. Share the camaraderie of devoted fans, whether you’re celebrating goals, debating calls, or singing your team’s chants. Wear your team colors, join in the excitement, and feel the energy of every moment.
Follow us on
Facebook
and
Instagram
for updates, schedules, and all the latest buzz. Come experience soccer like never before at Mary Margaret’s—where the passion of the Premier League and Celtic pride come alive!

Monday Night Karaoke – Powered by High Rise Beverages
Join us every Monday at 10p for Karaoke Night, sponsored by High Rise Beverages! Whether you're here to sing your heart out or cheer on your friends, it's the perfect way to kick off your week.
Great vibes, cold drinks, and your favorite songs all night long.  Plus, 40% off for all service industry pros – just show proof of employment.
See you Monday – the mic is waiting!

Soccer Matches at Mary Margaret's
Sunday August 31st
Sunday may 8th
Sundays and Saturdays every week
Love the thrill of the English Premier League and the passion of Glasgow Celtic FC? Mary Margaret’s is the place to be! Whether you’re a dedicated supporter of clubs like Manchester United, Arsenal, Liverpool, or Chelsea, or simply a fan of the beautiful game, our big screens and enthusiastic crowd make every match unforgettable. English Premier League fans bring their energy and passion, turning Mary Margaret’s into the ultimate game-day destination.
Join St Pete Shamrock - Tampa Bay's CSC, proud supporters of Glasgow Celtic FC, as they cheer on their team with unmatched enthusiasm. Share the camaraderie of devoted fans, whether you’re celebrating goals, debating calls, or singing your team’s chants. Wear your team colors, join in the excitement, and feel the energy of every moment.
Follow us on
Facebook
and
Instagram
for updates, schedules, and all the latest buzz. Come experience soccer like never before at Mary Margaret’s—where the passion of the Premier League and Celtic pride come alive!
10:00 AM - 10:00 PM
2025-08-31 10:00:00
2025-08-31 22:00:00

Monday September 1st
Sunday may 8th
Every Monday
Monday Night Karaoke – Powered by High Rise Beverages
Join us every Monday at 10p for Karaoke Night, sponsored by High Rise Beverages! Whether you're here to sing your heart out or cheer on your friends, it's the perfect way to kick off your week.
Great vibes, cold drinks, and your favorite songs all night long.  Plus, 40% off for all service industry pros – just show proof of employment.
See you Monday – the mic is waiting!
